summary.span: 绘制一系列相互连接的直线。

span.span: Draws a series of connected straight lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此对象是类似于对象，只不过此对象不需要是闭合的形状。This object is similar to the object, except that this object does not need to be a closed shape. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建元素，并设置其属性使用的代码。The following example shows how to create a element and set its properties by using code. [!code-cpp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/CPP/ShapesProcedural.cpp#shapesproceduralpolyline)] [!code-csharp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/Csharp/ShapesProcedural.cs#shapesproceduralpolyline)] [!code-vb[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/VisualBasic/ShapesProceduralVB.vb#shapesproceduralpolyline)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 枚举，该枚举指定如何确定形状的内部填充。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumeration that specifies how the interior fill of the shape is determined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举值确定的形状上的点的"内部性"。The enumeration value determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape. 它从点沿任意方向绘制一条射线，并对指定形状与射线相交的路径段的数量进行计数。It draws a ray from the point to infinity in any direction and counts the number of path segments from the specified shape that the ray crosses. 如果数字为奇数，该点在内部;如果为偶数，该点位于外部。If the number is odd, the point is inside; if it is even, the point is outside. 枚举值确定的形状上的点的"内部性"。The enumeration value determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape. 它首先从点沿任意方向绘制一条射线，然后检查段形状与射线相交的位置。It first draws a ray from the point to infinity in any direction and then examines the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray. 计数为零，启动一个每个时间段交叉从左到右的射线和减去一个每个时间路径段中添加与射线相交从右到左。It starts with a count of zero, adding one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtracting one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left. 如果结果为零，它会计算在对交叉点进行点后，位于路径外。After it counts the crossings, if the result is zero, the point is outside the path. 否则，该点则在路径内。Otherwise, it is inside. ![填充规则图](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填充规则图")![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule 示例FillRule Example ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 获取或设置一个集合，其中包含 的顶点。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection that contains the vertex points of the .

value.span: 描述 顶点的 结构的集合。

span.span: A collection of structures that describe the vertex points of the .

value.span: 默认值为空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中)。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，用空格分隔的以逗号分隔的 x 坐标和 y 坐标对列表用于设置此属性。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], use a space-delimited list of comma-separated x- coordinate and y-coordinate pairs to set this attribute. 使用简单表示法，即`x1,y1 x2,y2 ... xn,yn`。Use simple notation, that is, `x1,y1 x2,y2 ... xn,yn`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建元素，并设置通过使用代码的属性。The following example shows how to create a element and set the property by using code. [!code-cpp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/CPP/ShapesProcedural.cpp#shapesproceduralpolyline)] [!code-csharp[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/Csharp/ShapesProcedural.cs#shapesproceduralpolyline)] [!code-vb[shapesprocedural#ShapesProceduralPolyline](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ShapesProcedural/VisualBasic/ShapesProceduralVB.vb#shapesproceduralpolyline)]
